comments: TL2 has birthdate as 1707, but the portrait on page 164 of Stafleu, Linnaeus and the Linnaeans has the date 1706 in the inscription which is part of the portrait.
source: D.R. Hunt. Pichi Sermolli's list, 3 March 1991. Wijnands et al., Een Sieraad voor de Stad: 102 (1994), chapter 5 (pp. 103-131) is entitled 'Johannes & Nicolaas Burman'.
